public class zeta.content.zirp.Used

(source file: Used.pizza)
java.lang.Object
   |
   +----zeta.content.zirp.Used
The pure class interface. 
public class Used
Used names annotation slot. This slot is provided at all absy.Item terms which contain Z fragments. It lists all the global names (schemas or constants) which are applied in the Z fragment. Names locally bounded are not listed.

Version: $Id: Used.pizza,v 1.1.1.1 1998/09/01 10:51:18 wg Exp $
